item.title: Laura add a quote by the shawshank redemption
item.description: "hope is a good thing. maybe the best of good things. and no good thing ever dies" -- the shawshank redemption

item.title: Laura add a quote by charles de lint
item.description: "I don't want to live in the kind of world where we don't look out for each other. Not just the people that are close to us, but anybody who needs a helping hand. I cant change the way anybody else thinks, or what they choose to do, but I can do my bit." -- charles de lint

item.title: Laura add a quote by charles de lint
item.description: "Every time you do a good deed you shine the light a little farther into the dark. And the thing is, when you're gone that light is going to keep shining on, pushing the shadows back." -- charles de lint

item.title: Laura add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "See, as much as you want to hold on to the bitter sore memory that someone has left this world, you are still in it" -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Laura add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "You don't love someone because they're perfect, you love them in spite of the fact that they're not." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Laura add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "And the very act of living is a tide; at first it seems to make no difference at all, and then one day you look down and see how much pain has eroded" -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Laura add a quote by Mindy Klasky
item.description: "For there were good men. As long as we women remembered to be strong. As long as we remembered to be ourselves" -- Mindy Klasky

item.title: Laura add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "How many slams in an old screen door? Depends how loud you shut it. How many slices in a bread? Depends how thin you cut it. How much good inside a day? Depends how good you live 'em. How much love inside a friend? Depends how much you give 'em." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Laura add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "Listen to the mustn'ts, child. Listen to the don'ts. Listen to the shouldn'ts, the impossibles, the won'ts. Listen to the never haves, then listen close to me... Anything can happen, child. Anything can be." -- Shel Silverstein
